products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.description: Stirlooyster cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Lifetime Grain Light Grey
products.description: Lifetimegrain light grey will bring an on trend look to any room in the house. Their outstanding quality lifetime blinds are made to the same high standards as all their other venetian blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.
